title: Literary Fiction
description: We Represent A Wide Range Of Fiction From Very Committed To Very Literary And We Take On Any Novel A Literary Novel With An Ingenious Hook, A Quiet Romance, Or A Thrilling Adventure Story.

title: Non-Fiction
description: We Work In Every Category Of Non-Fiction From Award-Winning Narrative Stories To Science From The World s Leading Academics To Prescriptive Titles That Show You How To Lead A Better Life.

title: Young Readers
description: We Have A Robust List Of Young Adult And Middle Grade Novels As Well As A Growing List Of Picture Books. This Category Have Won Newbery Medals And Nominated For National Book And Stories.

title: Mystery & Suspense
description: We Represent Some Of The Most Talked About Suspense Authors Including Gillian Flynn, Author Of Gone Girl, Author Of The Infamous Spellman Series, Mysteries.
